While she did put that hit out on Sean, she certainly didn't imagine it'd come back
to bite her quite this way.
She at least thought her Uncle Poppy would have her back, but lucky for her, her fans
did have her back.
They launched a campaign to get her released, and while she lost a considerable amount of
wealth once Sean divorced her, their tokens helped reduce her sentence to 11 minutes.
Besides continuing her very important sex work, her new status as a hardened criminal allowed
her to pivot musically toward a career as a SoundCloud rapper, XXX Contacion, with critics
claiming that her song-for-song cover of Steely Dance Asia, titled "Ejagao", is "the most
sonically challenging, innovative, and meaningful work by an artist who conspired to murder their
spouse since the guy from As I Lay Dying did that."
Mad Suckler escaped the raid on his compound with his life, barely.
His entire collection of worms was killed by Papi Chuko's corporate military squad, and
most of his lieutenants were disbanded, some falling under his right-hand cyborgs, Mary
Kate and Ashley Cabrera, who betrayed the Suckler in the ensuing fight, creating two
new factions from one, making a mess of his once tight-knit operation.
Meanwhile, the Suckler himself has gone into hiding, still collecting paychecks from loyal
pushes, but with the portrayal of his cyborgs, a dethroned Jeff Tiedrich, and a chaotic scene
at Papi Chuko's Techno Slime, the path forward is less clear for the terrifying gangster than
it's ever been.
Officer Filipino Mr. Bean was disgraced for letting the Great Papi Chuko die right in
front of him.
He stepped down as police chief, got addicted to Techno Slime, and formed Cream 3 with Jeff
Tiedrich, who had that similar fall from grace, and the sole surviving worm of Papi Chuko's
collection that Ray William Johnson took in episode 5.
They have a modest following among sexual predators who frequent DIY scenes.
Speaking of worms, Jamal the worm took over Mommy Good Legs, turning it into Jamal's
wormhole.
It's become a popular nightclub thanks to Jamal's signature drink, the Dr. Pibb Cosby.
Because of the incident with Ray William Johnson shitting on his head, Jamal has developed a
new fetish that he doesn't want anyone to know about.
The all-dirt restaurant Cold Dogs and Hot Soda run by Gary C. Enterprise, famous Sullivan
the Frog impersonator, has become a smash hit.
Or success, you know, a restaurant's not like a hit.
Most of the tokens earned have been donated to Moms Against Drunk Driving.
Gary himself, however, has dutifully set aside some of the earnings for the three gentlemen
who gave him the restaurant.
He also patiently awaits their return.
And what happened to Mommy Good Legs?
Well, Mommy's long gone.
But with her is a Tommy Gun she can call a friend.
A new identity, and the coordinates to a safe house in a town not too far south.
She'll be out of Gun City by dawn.
She hopes the boys made it through okay.
She's sorry for everything she put them through.
But how else could she finally get away from Poppy?
Surely there was no other way.
Or were there other ways?
And uh, the decisions the players made were so completely fucking insane that you just uh...
You know, any possibility of another way was just sort of out the window by the third session, so...
You know, you just kind of uh, went with whatever the fuck was gonna, you know, get you to the end.
Or something... weird like that.
And our three detectives, where are they now?
Well, they're in their toughest spot yet.
The old slammer, where they helped put so many perps and innocent poor people in before.
Patrick Yoda has started meditating for 15 hours a day while in prison, and can almost
conjure a cheeseburger.
He is the prison staff's favorite.
Bloatoss Piss and his monkey Patrick started working out non-stop, and have even started
competitive lifting competitions in the yard.
The monkey Patrick has taken first place in the deadlift competition, three weeks running.
William Johnson meanwhile has joined the White Caillou's.
Who knows when they'll get out of there or if they can get out of there, the prison.

the fifth graders are gonna get the only good kickball.
